<a id="ReferenceRect"></a>

# ReferenceRect

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A rectangular box for designing UIs.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A rectangular box that displays only a colored border around its rectangle (see [Control.get_rect()](Control.md#Control_method_get_rect)). It can be used to visualize the extents of a [Control](Control.md) node, for testing purposes.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ReferenceRect_property_border_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **border_color** = `Color(1, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#ReferenceRect_property_border_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_border_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_border_color**\ (\ )

Sets the border color of the **ReferenceRect**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ReferenceRect_property_border_width"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **border_width** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#ReferenceRect_property_border_width)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_border_width**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_border_width**\ (\ )

Sets the border width of the **ReferenceRect**. The border grows both inwards and outwards with respect to the rectangle box.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ReferenceRect_property_editor_only"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **editor_only** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ReferenceRect_property_editor_only)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_editor_only**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_editor_only**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the **ReferenceRect** will only be visible while in editor. Otherwise, **ReferenceRect** will be visible in the running project.
